description: Senator John Le Fondre is accused of showing a "problem with the truth" by his challengers.
title: Jersey's chief minister faces vote of no confidence
title_page: Jersey's chief minister faces vote of no confidence - BBC News
maintext: But with the island at a critical stage in its fight against Covid-19, there are also those who believe a change could throw into doubt the future of the government's proposals to pay for the pandemic, build a new hospital and develop a population policy.
